verses.roman:
vāsudeva dekhi' prabhu ānandita hañā
tāṅre kichu kahe tāṅra aṅge hasta diyā

synonyms: vāsudeva—Vāsudeva; dekhi'—seeing; prabhu—Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; ānandita hañā—becoming very much pleased; tāṅre—unto him; kichu kahe—says something; tāṅra aṅge—on his body; hasta diyā—placing His hand.
translation: As soon as Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu saw Vāsudeva Datta, the father of Mukunda Datta, He immediately became very happy and, placing His hand on his body, began to speak.
